title: Drive Chain Rubbing Strips - Removal

body.body: Make sure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported.
A correctly supported motorcycle will help prevent it from falling.
An unstable motorcycle may fall, causing injury to the operator or damage to the motorcycle.
A stainless steel protection plate is secured to the swinging arm by the same fixing securing the upper rubbing strip. It also has a double sided adhesive tape securing it to the swinging arm.
When removing/installing the upper rubbing strip, care must be taken not to detach the protection plate from the swinging arm.
If the protection plate becomes detached or removed, a new protection plate must be fitted.
Note the position of the flanged sleeve for installation.
Remove the fixing and flanged sleeve. Discard the fixing.
Carefully manoeuvre the rubbing strip rearwards to remove from the swinging arm without detaching the protection plate.

body.name: Drive chain upper rubbing strip L0461

body.body: The exhaust silencer is shown removed for clarity.
Note the orientation of the lower rubbing strip for installation.
Remove the compression limiter and remove the lower rubbing strip from the swinging arm.

body.name: Drive chain lower rubbing strip L0460

Make sure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported.
A correctly supported motorcycle will help prevent it from falling.
An unstable motorcycle may fall, causing injury to the operator or damage to the motorcycle.
Drive Chain Upper Rubbing Strip
A stainless steel protection plate is secured to the swinging arm by the same fixing securing the upper rubbing strip. It also has a double sided adhesive tape securing it to the swinging arm.
When removing/installing the upper rubbing strip, care must be taken not to detach the protection plate from the swinging arm.
If the protection plate becomes detached or removed, a new protection plate must be fitted.
Note the position of the flanged sleeve for installation.
Remove the fixing and flanged sleeve. Discard the fixing.
Carefully manoeuvre the rubbing strip rearwards to remove from the swinging arm without detaching the protection plate.
Fixing
Flanged sleeve
Protection plate
Upper rubbing strip
Drive Chain Lower Rubbing Strip
The exhaust silencer is shown removed for clarity.
Note the orientation of the lower rubbing strip for installation.
Remove and discard the fixing.
Remove the compression limiter and remove the lower rubbing strip from the swinging arm.
Fixing
Lower rubbing strip
Compression limiter
